Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.runtime

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColumnVisitor<K>
    a visitor for Column
    IdsAcceptorsBuilder
    a (probably caching) builder of IdsAcceptor
    ReportDataVisitor<K>
    an interface used for recursively visiting a ReportData
    VSplitStrategy
    an interface which governs the way a column is split vertically: 1.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheHitsCounter
    utility container for counting cache misses
    CachingCalendarConverter
    a wrapper for a CalendarConverter which caches the result of calling an underlying CalendarConverter.
    This is done because AMP's CalendarWorkers are very slow, while at the same time AMP's datasets usually contain multiple reuses of the same transaction date (DRC and Tanzania have a reuse ratio of around 30x)
    CellColumn
    a leaf column
    Column
    a Report-output-column.
    ColumnContents
    the contents of a column inside of a CellColumn
    it is mutable, because it is used during report generation TODO: refactor given the fact that outputs have been separated
    ColumnReportData
    a leaf of a report - the bottom hierarchy, without any subreports
    CountedCacher<K,V>
    a thin Map wrapper which counts access stats
    DebugOutputReportDataVisitor
    a ReportData-to-String outputter useful for debugging and/or testcases
    GroupColumn
    a column with subcolumns.
    GroupReportData
    a disaggregated report containing subreports
    HeaderCalculator
    An implementation used for rasterizing the headers.
    HierarchiesTracker
    A class which tracks the hierarchies which have been applied on top of a cell.
    IdsAcceptorsBuilder.UnallocatedWrappingAcceptor
    a thin wrapper around an IdsAcceptor which returns true for undefined cells
    MultiHierarchiesTracker
    an umbrella for multiple-main-ids-trackers
    NiCell
    An immutable Cell wrapper which has identity and is not shared between reports or columns.
    NiColSplitCell
    info about the cell which has been used to split the parent report
    PostMeasureVHiersVisitor
    a ColumnVisitor which performs the post-measures splitting of the report.
    ReportData
    This class holds a disaggregated report, where all the individual cells, as fetched from the schema, can be found.
